channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Quotes and Tips by BestWebSoft
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Quotes and Tips by BestWebSoft

item.title: CVE-2024-3112|2024-07-12T15:19:04.910Z -- unknown -- quotes%20and%20tips%20by%20bestwebsoft
item.description: The Quotes and Tips by BestWebSoft WordPress plugin before 1.45 does not properly validate image files uploaded, allowing high privilege users such as admin to upload arbitrary files on the server even when they should not be allowed to (for example in multisite setup)

item.title: CVE-2024-3112|2024-07-12T06:00:05.645Z -- unknown -- quotes%20and%20tips%20by%20bestwebsoft
item.description: The Quotes and Tips by BestWebSoft WordPress plugin before 1.45 does not properly validate image files uploaded, allowing high privilege users such as admin to upload arbitrary files on the server even when they should not be allowed to (for example in multisite setup)
